scripts.flash: esptool --chip esp32 --port COM3 --baud 921600 write_flash --flash_mode=dio --flash_freq=80m --flash_size=detect 0x1000 espruino_2v09_esp32/bootloader.bin 0x10000 espruino_2v09_esp32/espruino_esp32.bin 0x8000 espruino_2v09_esp32/partitions_espruino.bin
scripts.reset: npm run erase && npm run flash
